title: 91/46/EEC: Commission Decision of 24 January 1991 on financial contributions from the Community for the eradication of contagious bovine pleuropneumonia in Italy (Only the Italian text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 24 January 1991  on financial contributions from the Community for the eradication of contagious bovine pleuropneumonia in Italy  (Only the Italian text is authentic)  (91/46/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Article 1
For outbreaks of contagious bovine pleuropneumonia which have occurred during the month of October 1990 Italy may obtain Community financial assistance. The financial contribution by the Community shall be:
- 50 % of the costs incurred by Italy in compensating owners for the slaughter and for destruction, as appropriate, of bovines and bovine products;
- 50 % of the costs incurred by Italy for the cleaning, disinsectization and disinfection of of holdings and equipment;
- 50 % of the costs incurred by Italy in compensating owners for the destruction of contaminated feedingstuffs and contaminated equipment.  Article 2
The Community financial contribution shall be granted after supporting documents have been submitted.  Article 3
The Community shall follow developments in the situation regarding the disease and, if necessary, due to its evolution, shall adopt a new Decision in accordance with the provisions laid down in Article 3 (4) of Decision 90/424/EEC.  Article 4
This Decision is addressed to the Italian Republic.
attachments:
